job.title: Machine Learning Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers our client mak technologies llc is seeking the following apply via dice todayltbrgtltbrgtmachine learning software engineer duration months location remote rate hr on cc all inc details as a machine learning software engineer for the client you will work on a product team to help drive and scale capabilities associated with integrating machine learning into business and manufacturing processes expect to work with the latest python packages and cloud infrastructure and all within continuous delivery and agile development process expect also to work with with aws machine learning sagemaker and supporting services like lambda iot and greengrass services as well as api gateway and cloud formation cdk the ideal candidate has a bs or ms in a software engineering computer science or related field of study proven deep experience leveraging devsecops and lean development principles such as continuous integration and continuous delivery if interested please send your uptodate resume kindly provide the following info total it exp ndash machine learning exp ndash java exp ndash python exp ndash awsazure exp ndash devsecops exp ndash full lifecycle implementation done ndash no of end to end projects located immigration status availability rate hr on cc all inc education ndash interested candidates please feel free to call pinaki deori ator email pinakideorimaktechnologiesllccom for more details
